Song.title: Who Made Me To Know You
Song.copyright: Words and Music by Pat Sczebel © 2005 Sovereign Grace Worship
Song.amazon_links: [{"asin":"B001BOTX70","title":"Who Made Me to Know You","artist":"Sovereign Grace Music","image_url":"http:\/\/ecx.images-amazon.com\/images\/I\/51ASvkc53%2BL._SL75_.jpg"}]

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [| G | Gsus4 | Em7 | C D/C | C]
Verse 1: Who made me to [C2]know You, but [G2/B]You [G/B]When dead in sin You [C2]gave me new [D]life Now my heart is [C2]filled{,} with love for [G2/B]You, [G/B] [C2]Jesus
Chorus: [G]Fa[G2]ther, [D/C]thank [C]You{,} for Your [G2/B]Spirit’s work in m[C C2 C]e For [Em7]o[D/E]pen-ing [D/C]my [C2]eyes{,} to the [G/B]Christ of Calvar[C]y Je[D]sus, You gave Your [C]life{,} [D]in exchange for [C/E]mine Now [D]I will live for [C]You who [D/C]died, [C] [ ]Jesus
Turn: [G G2 | D/E C/E | Em7 D/E | C D/C | C]
Verse 2: You placed a crown of [C2]grace on my [G/B]head [G/B]You covered me in [C2]robes of righteous[D]ness Forever I will [C2]always be [G2/B]Yours, [G/B] [C2]Jesus
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 who made me to know you but you when dead in sin you gave me new life now my heart is filled with love for you jesus chorus father thank you for your spirits work in me for opening my eyes to the christ of calvary jesus you gave your life in exchange for mine now i will live for you who died jesus turn verse 2 you placed a crown of grace on my head you covered me in robes of righteousness forever i will always be yours jesus
